languages.text: "Я — Мессия Прерывания". {n}Амарнат задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Я — вычислительная мощь шести праведников, но и нечто большее, как человек есть нечто большее, чем сумма его органов. Человек ли я... Вряд ли. Я — инфодух, обретший плоть ответ на вопрос, который мы задали Омниссии". {n}Глаз техножреца слегка прищуривается, будто он улыбается под респиратором.{/n} "Но человек, которого ты знал{mf||а}, навсегда останется в ядре моей системы".

"I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

Человек ли я... Вряд ли. Я — инфодух, обретший плоть ответ на вопрос, который мы задали Омниссии". {n}Глаз техножреца слегка прищуривается, будто он улыбается под респиратором.{/n} "Но человек, которого ты знал{mf||а}, навсегда останется в ядре моей системы".

As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我是终结的弥赛亚。”{n}阿玛纳特深思般地低下了头。{/n}“我是六个正义灵魂带来的计算能力，但我不止于此，正如人类并不仅仅只是器官的堆叠一样。至于我是不是人类……我怀疑我恐怕不是，我是数据精灵。我们曾向欧姆尼塞亚提出过无数问题，而我便是答案的化身。”{n}这位技术神甫的眼睛眯了一下，仿佛在呼吸器后面露出了微笑。{/n}“不过，你所认识的那个人，将会永远留在我的系统核心之中。”
languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: “我是终结的弥赛亚。”{n}阿玛纳特深思般地低下了头。{/n}“我是六个正义灵魂带来的计算能力，但我不止于此，正如人类并不仅仅只是器官的堆叠一样。至于我是不是人类……我怀疑我恐怕不是，我是数据精灵。我们曾向欧姆尼塞亚提出过无数问题，而我便是答案的化身。”{n}这位技术祭司的眼睛眯了一下，仿佛在呼吸器后面露出了微笑。{/n}“不过，你所认识的那个人，将会永远留在我的系统核心之中。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Soy el Mesías de la Discontinuidad». {n}Amarnat agacha la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Estoy formado por el poder computacional de seis almas justas, pero soy mucho más que eso, igual que un humano no es solo la suma de sus órganos. En cuanto a si sigo siendo humano... lo dudo. Soy un espíritu de datos, una encarnación de la respuesta a la pregunta que presentamos al Omnissiah». {n}El tecnosacerdotes entrecierra ligeramente el ojo, como si sonriera tras su respirador.{/n} «Sin embargo, la persona a la que conoció seguirá siendo el núcleo de mi sistema».
languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: «Soy el Mesías de la Discontinuidad». {n}Amarnat agacha la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Estoy formado por el poder computacional de seis almas justas, pero soy mucho más que eso, igual que un humano no es solo la suma de sus órganos. En cuanto a si sigo siendo humano... lo dudo. Soy un espíritu de datos, una encarnación de la respuesta a la pregunta que presentamos al Omnissiah». {n}El tecnosacerdotes entrecierra ligeramente el ojo, como si sonriera tras su respirador.{/n} «Sin embargo, la persona a la que conoció seguirá siendo el núcleo de mi sistema».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「私は廃絶の救世主」{n}アマルナトは物思いにふけりながら頭を下げた。{/n}「私は6つの正義の魂を集合させた計算力だが、それ以上のものだ。人間が臓器の総和以上のものであるように。私が人間かどうかについては…疑わしいと言えるだろう。私はデータ・スピリットであり、私たちが万機神に投げかけた質問の答えの化身なのだ」{n}呼吸器の奥で微笑むように、技術司祭は少し目を細める。{/n}「しかし、あなたが知っていた人物は、永遠に私のシステムの中核に残されている」
languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: 「私は廃絶の救世主」{n}アマルナトは物思いにふけりながら頭を下げた。{/n}「私は6つの正義の魂を集合させた計算力だが、それ以上のものだ。人間が臓器の総和以上のものであるように。私が人間かどうかについては…疑わしいと言えるだろう。私はデータ・スピリットであり、私たちが万機神に投げかけた質問の答えの化身なのだ」{n}呼吸器の奥で微笑むように、技術司祭は少し目を細める。{/n}「しかし、あなたが知っていた人物は、永遠に私のシステムの中核に残されている」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin der Messias der Unterbrechung." {n}Amarnat neigt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin die Rechenkraft von sechs rechtschaffenen Seelen, und doch bin ich mehr als das. Wie ein Mensch auch mehr als die Summe seiner Organe ist. Was die Frage angeht, ob ich menschlich bin ... Ich bezweifle es. Ich bin ein Datengeist, eine Inkarnation der Antwort auf die Frage, die wir dem Omnissiah gestellt haben." {n}Der Techpriester Verengt ein wenig das Auge, als würde er hinter seinem Respirator lächeln.{/n} "Doch die Person, die Ihr kanntet, wird für immer im Kern meines Systems bleiben."
languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin der Messias der Unterbrechung." {n}Amarnat neigt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin die Rechenkraft von sechs rechtschaffenen Seelen, und doch bin ich mehr als das. Wie ein Mensch auch mehr als die Summe seiner Organe ist. Was die Frage angeht, ob ich menschlich bin ... Ich bezweifle es. Ich bin ein Datengeist, eine Inkarnation der Antwort auf die Frage, die wir dem Omnissiah gestellt haben." {n}Der Techpriester Verengt ein wenig das Auge, als würde er hinter seinem Respirator lächeln.{/n} "Doch die Person, die Ihr kanntet, wird für immer im Kern meines Systems bleiben."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je suis le Messie de l'Interruption, {n}répond Amarnat en baissant la tête, l'air pensif.{/n} Je suis la puissance calculatrice de six âmes justes, mais je suis aussi plus encore, tout comme un être humain est plus que la somme de ses organes. Quant à savoir si je suis toujours humain... j'en doute. Je suis un esprit de données, une incarnation de la réponse à la question que nous avons posée à l'Omnimessie. » {n}Les yeux du technoprêtre se plissent légèrement, comme s'il souriait derrière son respirateur.{/n} « Cependant, la personne que vous connaissiez restera toujours au cœur de mon système. »
languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le Messie de l'Interruption, {n}répond Amarnat en baissant la tête, l'air pensif.{/n} Je suis la puissance calculatrice de six âmes justes, mais je suis aussi plus encore, tout comme un être humain est plus que la somme de ses organes. Quant à savoir si je suis toujours humain... j'en doute. Je suis un esprit de données, une incarnation de la réponse à la question que nous avons posée à l'Omnimessie. » {n}Les yeux du technoprêtre se plissent légèrement, comme s'il souriait derrière son respirateur.{/n} « Cependant, la personne que vous connaissiez restera toujours au cœur de mon système. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

languages.text: "Bozulum Mesihi'yim." {n}Amarnat, düşünceli bir tavırla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Altı erdemli ruhun işlem gücüyüm. Bir insan nasıl organlarının toplamının fazlasıysa ben de bundan fazlasıyım. İnsan olup olmadığıma gelirsek... Bundan şüpheliyim. Ben bir veri ruhum. Hermesih'e yönelttiğimiz soruların yanıtlarının vücut bulmuş hâliyim." {n}Tekno Rahip, solunum cihazının arkasından gülüyormuşçasına gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Tanıdığın şahıs ise sistemimin çekirdeğinde sonsuza kadar varlığını sürdürecek."
languages.original_text: "I am the Messiah of Discontinuing." {n}Amarnat lowers his head pensively.{/n} "I am the computing power of six righteous souls, yet I am more than that, much like a human is more than the sum of their organs. As to whether I am human... I doubt it. I am a data-spirit, an incarnation of the answer to the question we posed to the Omnissiah." {n}The Tech-Priest narrows his eye a little, as though smiling behind his respirator.{/n} "However, the person you knew will forever remain at the core of my system."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Devamsızlık Mesihi'yim." {n}Amarnat düşünceli bir tavırla başını eğiyor.{/n} "Altı erdemli ruhun işlem gücüyüm ama bir insan nasıl organlarının toplamının fazlasıylsa, ben de bundan daha fazlasıyım. İnsan olup olmadığıma gelirsek, bundan şüpheliyim. Ben bir veri ruhum. Hermesih'e yönelttiğimiz soruların yanıtlarının vücut bulmuş hâliyim." {n}Tekno Rahip solunum cihazının arkasında gülüyor gibi gözlerini biraz kısıyor.{/n} "Tanıdığın şahıs, sistemimin çekirdeğinde sonsuza kadar varlığını sürdürecek ama."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
